description: Best ancient history adventure! Travel in time to the age of pharaohs, when monument building and pyramid exploration were normal! Enjoy creative crafting & building of a desert city, visit the Sphynx, explore the mummy tombs! The whole ancient world waits to be explored!Get right into the exploration of an ancient city of the pyramids! Have a walk in the desert, watch a beautiful sunset! Visit the sphynx statue, go on an adventure around the pyramids, see the best parts of Egypt! Stroll on the banks of the great river Nile.Become a pharaoh and rule your desert kingdom! Walk among your subjects like a god, destroy buildings as you please, build any kind of monuments you want! This is your world and pyramid building is only one of the possible ways of spending your time. Use the creative mode to unleash the power of your imagination to better the world (or to crush it!). Create, destroy, enjoy!Best free crafting game of 2018! Use blueprints to build ancient monuments that will inspire awe. Simply place one and start filling it with blocks to recreate the most famous ancient egyptian structures that you'll certainly remember from history books. This free building game will also let you use your own imagination to create anything you want. Would you like to see a medieval castle in the middle of the desert? Go for it! Do you want to build your own house? Let's do it! Mine and craft materials from sands and stones.Crafting & building a city will allow you to feel like you've actually traveled in time to the age of ancient Egypt. The hot deserts, sandy buildings and people dressed in robes are all presented using unique blocky graphics that may remind you of other adventure games with building and exploration. All of this is your sandbox where you are free to do as you please. Crafting & building will become your second nature.Look no further - one of the top ancient history city building games is here! Download now and become a pharaoh!
descriptionHTML:
Best ancient history adventure! Travel in time to the age of pharaohs, when monument building and pyramid exploration were normal! Enjoy creative crafting & building of a desert city, visit the Sphynx, explore the mummy tombs! The whole ancient world waits to be explored!

Get right into the exploration of an ancient city of the pyramids! Have a walk in the desert, watch a beautiful sunset! Visit the sphynx statue, go on an adventure around the pyramids, see the best parts of Egypt! Stroll on the banks of the great river Nile.

Become a pharaoh and rule your desert kingdom! Walk among your subjects like a god, destroy buildings as you please, build any kind of monuments you want! This is your world and pyramid building is only one of the possible ways of spending your time. Use the creative mode to unleash the power of your imagination to better the world (or to crush it!). Create, destroy, enjoy!

Best free crafting game of 2018! Use blueprints to build ancient monuments that will inspire awe. Simply place one and start filling it with blocks to recreate the most famous ancient egyptian structures that you'll certainly remember from history books. This free building game will also let you use your own imagination to create anything you want. Would you like to see a medieval castle in the middle of the desert? Go for it! Do you want to build your own house? Let's do it! Mine and craft materials from sands and stones.

Crafting & building a city will allow you to feel like you've actually traveled in time to the age of ancient Egypt. The hot deserts, sandy buildings and people dressed in robes are all presented using unique blocky graphics that may remind you of other adventure games with building and exploration. All of this is your sandbox where you are free to do as you please. Crafting & building will become your second nature.

Look no further - one of the top ancient history city building games is here! Download now and become a pharaoh!
developer: Fat Lion Games: Crafting & Building Adventure
summary: Exploration, crafting & building a city in the ancient history! Build pyramids!
title: Egypt Craft: Pyramid Building & Exploration Games

description: Who will get to the top of Mount Dragon first? Blaze and AJ need help to speed past Crusher's obstacles to win the Adventure Race Pro Duel!This game will outstand you, boys, and we say boys because it's a car racing game and well, let's face it, there are few girls that love to play cars games, especially racing cars, and you boys sure do have the skills to play this kind of games. We uploaded this game category for boys, and the first game from this category is called Blaze Mud Race Mountain. Blaze and his best friend AJ were challenged by their rival, Crusher, on a race along the dangerous Adventure Race, but Crusher is not playing fair, using cheat tips, so, your two best friends, Blaze and AJ are really counting on your help. You have to watch out for the obstacles such as big rocks and oil puddles, and on your way up to the top try to collect as many red flags as possible in order to beat Crusher.

Welcome to explore this endless running world! Here you will run with the loveliest Ninja rabbit in forest. Speed up to surpass other rivals to be the fastest runner!

description: Your bag is packed and you’re ready to go, but as fate has it, you’re stranded in Rome with only 500 coins in your pocket. What now?Show the world what you’re made of in Backpacker, a new globetrotting trivia game! Save up enough money to continue your travels by going on various missions and applying for odd jobs! At the end of each day, either splurge on a hotel or risk sleeping in the streets. Discover new cities and maybe even learn a thing or two along the way.Backpacker Features* Test your trivia skills!        * See the world, one city at a time!* Complete your memento collection with tokens from each city! * Collect job diplomas and earn cash for traveling!        * Help strangers around the world for secret rewards! * Stamp your passport in each city, can you collect them all? * Which mini game will become your new favourite?"Conquer the world, become a Backpacker!Backpacker has been lovingly created, we take fun seriously.Join a global audience of more than 100 million players and check out some of our other chart-topping hit games like Ruzzle, Wordalot or WordBrain 2!We really value your feedback, go to www.facebook.com/BackpackerGame and say what's on your mind!More about MAG Interactive at www.maginteractive.comGood Times!
descriptionHTML:
Your bag is packed and you’re ready to go, but as fate has it, you’re stranded in Rome with only 500 coins in your pocket. What now?

Show the world what you’re made of in Backpacker, a new globetrotting trivia game!
Save up enough money to continue your travels by going on various missions and applying for odd jobs!
At the end of each day, either splurge on a hotel or risk sleeping in the streets.
Discover new cities and maybe even learn a thing or two along the way.

Backpacker Features

* Test your trivia skills!
* See the world, one city at a time!
* Complete your memento collection with tokens from each city!
* Collect job diplomas and earn cash for traveling!
* Help strangers around the world for secret rewards!
* Stamp your passport in each city, can you collect them all?

comments: Well i would give this five stars but you cant watch an add to get a power up! And you should lower the ad mount of adds i cant go in for 10 seconds without an add popping up!! Overall good great game
Way too many ads after every time I lose or go onto another level an advert pops up. Verry annoying. But the gameplay is decent.

I know it's free, so ads are to be expected but there are so many ads that it significantly impacts the experience. Win a level, ad. Lose a level, ad. Replay a level (which is by far the most common scenario), ad. I understand that the developers have to make their money but if it's at the expense of gameplay then that's absurd. Uninstalled after ~30 minutes of playing.

Look, I understand that you have to make money somehow, and ads are how you make money on a free game. But these ads are way too frequent and obnoxious. I listen to podcasts while playing games and every minute or so my sound cuts out completely to prioritize the ad. Earn the ad by giving me a decent amount of playtime before it and stop overriding my audio.
The game is good but it contains too many adds.. it sucks.. after every 2 or 3 levels an add pops up, it irritates so much... pls increase the interval of the adds

I like the game itself but when you have 3 adds coming up after one game you hardly can enjoy the game. Super annoying, so if you download it for free be prepared to buy it otherwise it will drive you crazy!

description: Become a celebrated sniper hero in American Block Sniper Survival. This brutal running and shooting action game stars you as a sniper of a deadly operation. Trek through a devastated war torn city in pursuit of the enemy. Only once your objective has been met can you all the mission a success. ****READY YOUR WEAPONS****They would descend upon villages, bringing fire and death with them. Grave after grave... I couldn't bear to be a part of that anymore. The issue was so big, so consuming, and the world had forgotten about the horrors confronted on the battlefield: a child's burnt sock on the side of the road, blood spattered alleyways, the haunting stench of death and the ring of a report playing on repeat in your head as you try to sleep at night... and the look on the target's face as the blood drained from his body. But it this was war, and the law of a good soldier was a lack of feeling. Numbing my emotions and attachments to the people and places I visited was a challenge, but I soon realized the benefit... because now I was unstoppable.**** INTENSE GAME PLAY **** Launch a fun, fast-paced 3D mobile gaming experience upon downloading this addictive FPS game. Strike fast and kill enemies in this combat challenge. Collect ammo and HP pickups as you advance. These pickups will decrease though, while the number of enemies increases significantly. This ultimate battle offers the option to go at it hand-to-hand or with a range of melee and firearm weapons. The choice is yours. Choose your difficulty, earn power-ups by completing quick tasks and unlock levels on the mission map select. Features:-Pixel cube graphics-Six levels to conquer -Precision aiming -Radar map-Health meter -Perks & power-ups-Blocky weapon collect
descriptionHTML:
Become a celebrated sniper hero in American Block Sniper Survival. This brutal running and shooting action game stars you as a sniper of a deadly operation. Trek through a devastated war torn city in pursuit of the enemy. Only once your objective has been met can you all the mission a success.

****READY YOUR WEAPONS****
They would descend upon villages, bringing fire and death with them. Grave after grave... I couldn't bear to be a part of that anymore. The issue was so big, so consuming, and the world had forgotten about the horrors confronted on the battlefield: a child's burnt sock on the side of the road, blood spattered alleyways, the haunting stench of death and the ring of a report playing on repeat in your head as you try to sleep at night... and the look on the target's face as the blood drained from his body. But it this was war, and the law of a good soldier was a lack of feeling. Numbing my emotions and attachments to the people and places I visited was a challenge, but I soon realized the benefit... because now I was unstoppable.

**** INTENSE GAME PLAY ****
Launch a fun, fast-paced 3D mobile gaming experience upon downloading this addictive FPS game. Strike fast and kill enemies in this combat challenge. Collect ammo and HP pickups as you advance. These pickups will decrease though, while the number of enemies increases significantly. This ultimate battle offers the option to go at it hand-to-hand or with a range of melee and firearm weapons. The choice is yours. Choose your difficulty, earn power-ups by completing quick tasks and unlock levels on the mission map select.

comments: Great game! I love the challenge and not having any tips or help at all. Just 2 things need to change ! First the jump and sit button, make them bigger for better control, and change the look😂 I mean srsly "!!" Means jump?!😂 And second add an option to record the game and share it. I noticed there is one, but it doesn't work.

Guys, this is an amazing game! Seriously, only problem the jump button is EXTEMELY unresponsive.. especially on the swimming levels, is this a design choice or a small bug, because on the normal land levels its "ok" still horrible but on the swimming levels its extremely unresponsive and is hard to stay consistant. This is the games biggest flaw. Its EXTREMELY unresponsive

Hardest game i've ever played, but i completed all of the current levels,best game ever! waiting for the new levels! Stop crying about levels 8 and 9, they are easy! you just need to learn the pattern, after I learnt it now I can beat the game with ZERO DEATHS! So if you can't do this it dosen't mean it's impossible you noobs!

Love this game! I have beaten both new and classic levels and they are awesome. The spinning line of blades that go up and down the screen in Level 8 is especially brutal, and took me several tries to beat. To everyone saying its impossible, its not. Just keep trying and you will get it. Overall just a fun mobile game.

Great don't know why people are complaining about difficulty, just got to learn the patterns. There is a glitch though that doesn't let you access the third submarine (level 11?) level half the time. Get a game in development screen instead
Nice game but the devlopers are greesy wont let you play if you dont pay. By annoying ads every two seconds or cash. Too bad. Could be a successful game.

descriptionHTML:
Solitaire Collection is a BRAND-NEW collection of various solitaire card games, which contains Classic Solitaire(also known as Klondike or Patience), Spider, FreeCell, Pyramid & TriPeaks(TriTowers, Three Peaks, and Triple Peaks).


⚡ HIGHLIGHTS ⚡

- Classic Solitaire Gameplay:
We kept all the games true to the spirit of the classic solitaires, and specifically optimized the games for an unmatched solitaire experience on mobile devices.

- Fun & Addictive Challenges:
Solitaire card games are fun and challenging puzzle games that anyone can enjoy! Gameplay is very simple to start but hard to master. Millions of users have fun for hours every day all over the world!

- Beautiful Designs & Customizable Themes:
By removing all the unnecessary features, our game is the most easy-to-play with clean and intuitive designs. Meanwhile, we have added 100+ beautiful themes on top of the classic card game design.

 
✅ INCLUDES ✅

- CLASSIC SOLITAIRE
In Classic Solitaire (also known as Klondike or Patience), try to collect all the cards in 1 card or 3 card mode. Don’t forget to try the Vegas scoring mode as well!

- SPIDER SOLITAIRE
Play with two decks of 52 cards each. Depending on difficulty, the deck consists of one, two or four different suits. Try to collect them with fewest moves possible!

- FREECELL SOLITAIRE
Win a game by creating four stacks of cards, one per suit. The secret of winning is the extra four cells!

- PYRAMID SOLITAIRE
Combine two cards that add up to 13 to remove them from the board. Challenge yourself to reach the top of the Pyramid and clear as many boards as you can!

- TRIPEAKS SOLITAIRE
Select cards in a sequence, earn combo points, and clear as many boards as you can before you run out of deals!

- DAILY CHALLENGES
Looking forward for more challenges? Try to solve all daily challenges! The challenges are guaranteed solvable and will be updated every day!

- TOURNAMENT
Join the tournament and play against real players from all over the world, practice your skills and get the first place in the weekly rank leaderboard!


✨ FEATURES ✨

♠ Daily challenges with different levels
♠ Customizable beautiful themes
♠ 2 Players Tournaments
♠ 4 Players Tournaments
♠ Up to 10 top records
♠ Klondike Solitaire Draw 1 card or 3 cards
♠ Standard or Vegas Casino scoring
♠ Timer mode
♠ Left-handed mode
♠ Landscape mode
♠ Multiple languages supported
♠ Single tap or drag&drop to move cards
♠ Auto-collect cards on completion
♠ Auto-save game in play
♠ Feature to Undo moves
♠ Feature to use Hints
♠ Play offline! No Wi-Fi required
 
Like playing Patience or Klondike Solitaire on PC?
It is surely the BEST solitaire collection in your hands!
Train your brain as well as kill time with friends together!

COME and TRY our Solitaire Collection for FREE!
★★★ 100% Addictive & Fun, Download It NOW! ★★★

Any problems or question?
Email us to support@solitairegames.freshdesk.com

description: Fasten your seatbelt, start your engine and get ready for some real driving! This isn't one of those fantasy scenarios, where cars behave like children's toys and all you have to do is drive as fast as you can. This is a game for true car enthusiasts. Select one of many meticulously rendered vehicles and take it for a spin in a lifelike environment. Cruise in the subburbs, traverse the city streets and show you have what it takes to consider yourself a real driver.A VARIETY OF EXCITING CARSWe have something for everyone. There's a sports car, a pickup, a caravan, even a police van! Every one of them poses a different challenge. Learn to take advantage of their strengths, work around their weaknesses!BELIEVABLE CITY ENVIRONMENTSYou will drive around tracks designed to look as lifelike as possible. City streets are bustling with traffic, the details give the surroundings a real sense of place.REALISTIC TRAFFICStaying on course and avoiding the obstacles won't be your only concern. You also have to mind other cars. Watch other drivers as they go about their business and don't let them interfere with yours!FREE TO PLAYThe Main Game Mode is 100% FREE to play, all the way through, no strings attached! Extra Game Modes which alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through optional In-App Purchases.GAME FEATURES▶ VARIED VEHICLES: Drive & Park 10 Unique and Different Vehicles▶ PARKING: Over 50 Precision Driving Missions to Pass!▶ ARENA: Each track is a challenge full of obstacles and opportunities.▶ 100% Free-2-Play Missions▶ CONTROLS: Buttons, Wheel or Tilt Controls▶ CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view
descriptionHTML:
Fasten your seatbelt, start your engine and get ready for some real driving! This isn't one of those fantasy scenarios, where cars behave like children's toys and all you have to do is drive as fast as you can. This is a game for true car enthusiasts. Select one of many meticulously rendered vehicles and take it for a spin in a lifelike environment. Cruise in the subburbs, traverse the city streets and show you have what it takes to consider yourself a real driver.

A VARIETY OF EXCITING CARS

We have something for everyone. There's a sports car, a pickup, a caravan, even a police van! Every one of them poses a different challenge. Learn to take advantage of their strengths, work around their weaknesses!

BELIEVABLE CITY ENVIRONMENTS

You will drive around tracks designed to look as lifelike as possible. City streets are bustling with traffic, the details give the surroundings a real sense of place.

REALISTIC TRAFFIC

Staying on course and avoiding the obstacles won't be your only concern. You also have to mind other cars. Watch other drivers as they go about their business and don't let them interfere with yours!

FREE TO PLAY

The Main Game Mode is 100% FREE to play, all the way through, no strings attached! Extra Game Modes which alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through optional In-App Purchases.

GAME FEATURES

▶ VARIED VEHICLES: Drive & Park 10 Unique and Different Vehicles
▶ PARKING: Over 50 Precision Driving Missions to Pass!
▶ ARENA: Each track is a challenge full of obstacles and opportunities.
▶ 100% Free-2-Play Missions
▶ CONTROLS: Buttons, Wheel or Tilt Controls
▶ CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view

description: ALL LIGHT is a connection puzzle game that will exercise your brain as Brain Teasers and improve your creativity by solving each puzzle. Test yourself. ;)[HOW TO PLAY]• Link the battery to the light bulbs to turn them ON!• Connect bulbs (lamps) with battery to turn on them.• Turn on all bulbs by connecting with energy source to solve each puzzle.• Each bulb shows the number of wires required to turn it on.• A red light bulb means that the wires are connected more than necessary.• Just tap the line to remove the wire.[FEATURES]• Simple but innovative linking puzzle!- Playing is as simple as just touching the screen.- Challenge the higher packages that will gradually get harder!• Play without any limit or restriction!- No lives or No energy.- Follow your own pace and enjoy freely this linking puzzle as much as you want!• Simple and Intuitive Design- Men and Women of all ages can enjoy this game. Feel the satisfaction of the lights turning ON.• Highly Optimized Gameplay!- Very light on your device! Download Now!- No need to use internet data while playing. Enjoy this linking puzzle whenever and wherever.
descriptionHTML:
ALL LIGHT is a connection puzzle game that will exercise your brain as Brain Teasers and improve your creativity by solving each puzzle. Test yourself. ;)


[HOW TO PLAY]
• Link the battery to the light bulbs to turn them ON!
• Connect bulbs (lamps) with battery to turn on them.
• Turn on all bulbs by connecting with energy source to solve each puzzle.
• Each bulb shows the number of wires required to turn it on.
• A red light bulb means that the wires are connected more than necessary.
• Just tap the line to remove the wire.


[FEATURES]
• Simple but innovative linking puzzle!
- Playing is as simple as just touching the screen.
- Challenge the higher packages that will gradually get harder!

• Play without any limit or restriction!
- No lives or No energy.
- Follow your own pace and enjoy freely this linking puzzle as much as you want!

• Simple and Intuitive Design
- Men and Women of all ages can enjoy this game. Feel the satisfaction of the lights turning ON.

• Highly Optimized Gameplay!
- Very light on your device! Download Now!
- No need to use internet data while playing. Enjoy this linking puzzle whenever and wherever.

comments: This game is fun and entertaining and you can test drive all the vehicles which make it quite cool. Wish there was a camera view which you could zoom out so you can see from a better angle of all those around you. Reversing auto changes the camera. Some times multiple simultaneous button clicks don't work. And I wish they had one of my favourite cars here, the Lamborghini Sesto Elemento

I'm loving these updates really bring more life to the game. The new car is really fun because it can flip over really easy. Please don't change that. A few suggestions: When you go to winter wonderland you can't go back. Would be cool if car panels would become detached like the hood or the trunk. Adding a police cruiser would be cool too. I like the breakable rear lights on some of the cars. Maybe add deflatable tires? Very good game all in all

This is one of the best games I have plus I play it a lot. I like how in the new update the cops chase you if you make them angry although I would like to see a  Nissan 240sx and the Chevy  Silverado (with and without the cover over the bed) in the game. Also it would be cool if you added an option to raise the cars. If you could add a multiplayer mode or even a campaign mode that would be great. Overall this is a great game and I think every let should be introduced to it. Could you guys also make the city cars available to drive? I read the other reviews and I personally think that adding drag racing and monster trucks to the game would be AWESOME!! Oh and PLEASE ADD A HALO WORTHOG!!! PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE!!!

I had loved this game until it stopped saving my car purchases. Like my last  one the pick up that looks exactly like a 80s chevy with the cap off and roll cage. I put 7.0 motor in it with NOS tires and paint. Went in this morning it was gone. Please fix.Norton also says you're monitoring my location how obtrusive you dushbags.

Need a 67 Shelby mustang gt 500 fastback "Eleanor". Also needs a hand brake for sharp turns and drifting and maybe an inside view with steering wheel and stick shift. Very fun and addicting game. Great job here. Multi-player would be cool too.

Kept telling me that I was going the wrong way even though I was going the right way while racing. Which then it puts you in last place. So, I'm uninstalling this game because it's frustrating to be winning a race and a design flaw ruins the game for me. Also, giving more camera angles would be nice for the other players not uninstalling this game like I am right now☠☠☠☠

comments: A superb implementation of sudoku, with an intuitive and helpful interface. It would be nice to allow us to input our own sudoku, but other than that, this game is complete. A big minus is that the adverts come with sound; this is disruptive and entirely unnecessary.

Now that it is possible to pay to remove ads it's a 5. Minor issues: the note highlight should be a dimmer colour than placed numbers, it should not be possible to put a note over a placed number, or at least this behaviour should be a selectable option. If these 3 things are sorted out it will be a five star from me.
Just AWESOME, the design is incredibly good and the themes feature just stunning. My new favorite Sudoku app by far. The only thing I wish it had is handwriting recognition.
Great app and the best for Sudoku and I'm updating my review to 5 stars for the option to remove ads. I bought it and am happy now. :)
THE TIME TO BE A TRUE GAMER IS HERE!! prepare your ANUS
I'd give this a perfect score if there was an option to buy to remove ads. 3-5-18 edit: they added an option to remove ads. Sweet! Goes to 5 star for me!

descriptionHTML:
Sudoku - Pretty puzzling. A free and offline Sudoku app.

Presenting you a modern and rethought Sudoku design. By removing excessive details from the screen, we managed to create a fresh and clean look for the puzzle that we all love - at the same time sustaining intuitive gameplay and customization.

Highlighted features:
- Selecting themes during gameplay
- Clean look and feel

More features:
- Input modes: cell first and digit first - without toggling
- Pencil marks (with automatic removal)
- 5 difficulty levels
- Top times
- Works offline
- Digit highlighting
- Count of remaining digits
- Automatic saving
- Undo
- Board validation
- Optional aids
- Edge to edge board
- Satisfying animations
- Switch on and off themes

What to wait for:
- More themes
- Fix for vertically longer screens
- IAP, to remove ads


Enjoy!


EULA: http://dustland.ee/sudoku/eula/
Privacy Policy: http://dustland.ee/sudoku/privacy-policy/
summary: Play Sudoku and feel beautiful!
title: Sudoku - The Clean One

description: ■ Survival mode unlocked!■ New items, stages and zombies!■ Adjusted difficulty level.■ SynopsisOnce an ordinary man, Peter is left to survive in midst of a zombie apocalypse. As he fights against them, his strength and skill grows.Your job is simple - survive.■ FeaturesKill zombies and collect Gold to upgrade teammates and various installations - to kill more zombies!Simply tap to fire your gun.Your tapping speed determines the firing speed.Hire teammates to increase chance of survival in this world of despair.Experience this simple, yet strategic game!■ InfoYou can use auto-fire when you reach a certain level.There are various skills that can save you from critical situation.Every teammate has different weapons, with unique attributes.Kill zombies for Gold. Use the Gold to upgrade teammates and maintain the camp.Offensive or deffensive? It all depends on your choice.As days pass zombies become stronger, and they will become even more powerful during night time. Collect various inventory items for additional strength.It's a good idea to check the type of item each Boss yields.Mine is a very powerful weapon with devastating damage.When barricade is breached, zombies can attack your teammates.Nuke will restart the game, but you'll keep inventory items.When you have an inventory item, obtain another identical item to upgrade it.If the game is too hard, try again from the start with your inventory items by using Nuke.There's a massive Last Boss waiting for you.■ This game saves player data in device. Deleting the app will terminate all save data.
descriptionHTML:
■ Survival mode unlocked!
■ New items, stages and zombies!
■ Adjusted difficulty level.

■ Synopsis
Once an ordinary man, Peter is left to survive in midst of a zombie apocalypse. As he fights against them, his strength and skill grows.
Your job is simple - survive.

■ Features
Kill zombies and collect Gold to upgrade teammates and various installations - to kill more zombies!

Simply tap to fire your gun.
Your tapping speed determines the firing speed.

Hire teammates to increase chance of survival in this world of despair.

Experience this simple, yet strategic game!

■ Info
You can use auto-fire when you reach a certain level.
There are various skills that can save you from critical situation.
Every teammate has different weapons, with unique attributes.
Kill zombies for Gold. Use the Gold to upgrade teammates and maintain the camp.
Offensive or deffensive? It all depends on your choice.
As days pass zombies become stronger, and they will become even more powerful during night time.
Collect various inventory items for additional strength.
It's a good idea to check the type of item each Boss yields.
Mine is a very powerful weapon with devastating damage.
When barricade is breached, zombies can attack your teammates.
Nuke will restart the game, but you'll keep inventory items.
When you have an inventory item, obtain another identical item to upgrade it.
If the game is too hard, try again from the start with your inventory items by using Nuke.
There's a massive Last Boss waiting for you.

■ This game saves player data in device. Deleting the app will terminate all save data.

17, Bukbusunhwando-ro, Nam-gu, Ulsan, Republic of Korea
44632
summary: Survive chaotic zombie apocalypse!Tap and kill endless wave of zombie horde!
title: 100 DAYS - Zombie Survival

comments: I've been on Township since 2015 and I absolutely love it. Its the first game I play in the morning and the last one I play at night. This game has so much personality. From the characters to the animals, it is by far the best game that I've played so far. Keeps me busy for hours and I recently got my boyfriend hooked, keeps him as busy as it does myself. I don't have any complaints about it. Thank you GPG for coming up with a game so super fantastic. Kudos to the developers.

This game needs the ability to gain more township cash. I have spent way too much real money to buy township cash and im not doing so again at this rate. Farmville isnt this bad and hard to expand.  You cant expand the barn without waiting on products by train or paying in township cash to expand. And that costs over a couple hundred township cash for each expansion. Getting a dollar or two here and there takes forever to collect. Plus the expansion makes small expansions so it doesnt help much.   If something dont change i may quit the game. I enjoy it and would like to continue but at this rate i dont see much point. I cant afford to pay more money to play.

The VERY best game EVER..so fast to level up... Never boring.. Always SO much to do!!! ... it NEVER asks 4 money !!!!!!   NO pop ups or commercials. !!!. . the inventors are genius... i Love this game..  thank you for making this game.. Graphics are Amazing!!!   Best farming game ...Bonus Zoo !!!...and breed ur animals ADORABLE BABIES.. with a splash of Cityville  ..Gold digging..making ingots to use...  So many optional tournaments if u want to win more money n prizes in the Regattas... Township friends make it SO much easier n fast 4 everyone  .. and so much more You just HAVE TO Try TOWNSHIP ❣💞

The Best!  But not Great my suggestion is please add an option to chat your friends privately this is important!.  Also add an option to search anyone by their township name so we can easily adding them.. Last one add an option to change your profiles photo from our gallery if you can~ instead of using our Facebook photos or township original photos.. Please make it happen

Great game very addictive, and I don't know if I just found the right Co-op or what but the team work on this game is amazing. I love my little town although, 😒 you need to be able to expand faster! I have NO ROOM for any more buildings, and they want me to expand my population so I can add more buildings. Thats's kind of ridiculous. That's the only bad thing I have to say about this game.

Well this game is better then most farming games i have played. The crops dont die is a major plus for me . The only thing i dont like is the wait time for things i think there to long at times. But other wise one of my fav games . Love the notification sounds there fun and i really enjoy the club that u can join find a good one like i did and u have a bunch of nice and helpful ppl. Would recommend playing this game and all the others tjis company makes
description: Township is a unique blend of city-building and farming! Build your dream town! Harvest crops at the farms, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town. Trade with exotic countries. Open restaurants, cinemas, and other community buildings to give life in your town special flavor. Explore the mine to get resources and find ancient artifacts. Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world.Are you ready to become a farmer and city-manager to build your dream? Let’s get started!Township features:● Different buildings and decorations you can use to create your dream town● Various crops to grow and later process at your factories● Fun, charismatic townspeople with orders you need to fill● Your town's mine packed with ancient artifacts to discover and collect● Lovely animals to take care of● Farms to manage and expand● Exotic goods brought from islands● A zoo to build where you can even breed animals● Country flags and famous landmarks you can use to decorate your town, like the Statue of Liberty, Big Ben, and many more!● Play with your Facebook and Google+ friends, make new friends in the game community create your own clans! Township is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.*Internet connection is required to play the game and enable social interactions, competitions and other features* Enjoying Township? Learn more about the game! Facebook: www.facebook.com/TownshipMobile Twitter: twitter.com/township_mobile Questions? Contact our Tech Support at support@playrix.com.
descriptionHTML:
Township is a unique blend of city-building and farming!

Build your dream town! Harvest crops at the farms, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town. Trade with exotic countries. Open restaurants, cinemas, and other community buildings to give life in your town special flavor. Explore the mine to get resources and find ancient artifacts. Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world.
Are you ready to become a farmer and city-manager to build your dream? Let’s get started!

Township features:
● Different buildings and decorations you can use to create your dream town
● Various crops to grow and later process at your factories
● Fun, charismatic townspeople with orders you need to fill
● Your town's mine packed with ancient artifacts to discover and collect
● Lovely animals to take care of
● Farms to manage and expand
● Exotic goods brought from islands
● A zoo to build where you can even breed animals
● Country flags and famous landmarks you can use to decorate your town, like the Statue of Liberty, Big Ben, and many more!
● Play with your Facebook and Google+ friends, make new friends in the game community create your own clans!

Township is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.

*Internet connection is required to play the game and enable social interactions, competitions and other features*

Enjoying Township? Learn more about the game!
Facebook: www.facebook.com/TownshipMobile
Twitter: twitter.com/township_mobile

Questions? Contact our Tech Support at support@playrix.com.

comments: I gave Fish Tycoon 2 4 stars I have spent a lot of time playing this game, BUT, recently the daily rewards and rewards for task completion which include coins do not work.  You complete the task, you are told you are getting $200 added to you bank account, BUT your $ total does not change.  This makes it hard to get money to spend.  All you can do is breed and sell fish - which takes time.  I reported this and got a prompt response that they are sorry and that they were adding $ and Gems  to my account balances.  Nice, but my $ total did not change.  I did see an increase in my gems.  There is an update 2/21/18 hopefully this will improve some issues.

The upgrades are too expensive, with no other source of income than just selling fishes that takes forever to grow (if they even grow to adult), and watching ads. I tried to make it work for a day but it's super hard to earn money for upgrades. Even watching ads give so little rewards. Uninstalling. So unfortunate because i really loved the PC version of this.

I fell in love with these developers when I saw a co-worker playing Virtual Families.  It's so cute!  From there, I got into Virtual Villagers and Fish Tycoon.  This second release is better than the first, but it's still the same basic gameplay.  (tip: Don't buy uncommon eggs too early, or you'll be struggling with too many dying rare fish)
I personally hated it because it changed so much from the original. Nothing was wrong with how it operated, it was just to diffetent(IT CHANGED THE MAGIC FISH SPECIES)
Love this game & the support staff rocks. Made a huge mess if things and asked them to reset. They did and offered me game gifts, so quick to reply and very friendly!!!
Would love a way to pause the game or a way to keep a fish from dying if you stop playing. Woke up one morning and all my fish were dead. Please fix

descriptionHTML:
** Please note: this game requires an active internet connection! **

A note from the developer:

Hi there! I know you've been waiting a long time for the opportunity to become a bigger and better fish tycoon. I’m happy to tell you it’s your lucky day!! Now you can rediscover and explore the lost magic fish of Isola as you feed, breed, and sell your way from small time merchant to the ultimate aquatic entrepreneur!

Dive into a delightfully fishy adventure of a real-time virtual aquarium with over 400 unique and distinctive fish to discover: it’s an adorable fishtank mania!

Just like a real world, this one will be changing and growing along with the families of pet fish you collect and care for. The truth is, we are a small team and putting everything that we want into these games is not always possible. While you are discovering the world of Fish Tycoon 2: Virtual Aquarium, we’ll be investigating lots of new and exciting changes for the future. We hope to continue working on Fish Tycoon 2: Virtual Aquarium and making it more beautiful, more fun, and more real as the months go on.

Features:

Start with access to 400+ unique species of fish!
Unlock an array of useful upgrades and power-ups!
Renovate your storefront and reveal special surprises to expand your fish empire!
Nurture and cure your fish using magical plants and marine life!
Hire a colorful mascot to draw in the big crowds!
Decorate your tank with a plethora of gorgeous items!
Research advertising, environment and food to sustain rarer species and increase your revenue!

Check out our other hit games like Virtual Families, Virtual Villagers, and more! Bye!

Thanks for playing,
Arthur Humphrey
Lead Designer, Last Day of Work
recentChanges: Some optimizations and improvements for our Tycoons!
summary: Discover, breed and sell rare and exotic fish in this beautiful, realistic game!
title: Fish Tycoon 2 Virtual Aquarium

description: The new Super Panther Hero is in town, Panther Super Villain Bank Robbery game is the new Super villain fighting game of the house. comments: Cool looking game played like 15 matches. Annndd then it started freezing. In a single player match i would fire 2 shots and the my entire phone would stop and the only way to get out is to close the app. Im using a galaxy j7

Very fun and addictive. But there are these ads that open up my internet browser when I'm playing. Also, beeping noise came from the app. I immediately pressed the home button and the beeping stopped, so I know it's the app making those noises. Please fix the ad issue in the next update. :)

I really like playing the game, it's fun with all the different character mechanics, but after the last update there has been a huge increase in ads that take me away from the game and open up play store or chrome. It does this in the middle of a round, so obviously it screws up my gameplay. Makes me consider paying for no ads, but also makes me want to delete.

An unbelievable amount of ads in an otherwise fun game.   Ads after every match and spam ads trying to open my web browser multiple times mid match, somtimes when I'm preparing my shot which completely ruins it. Such a shame the devs chose to ruin their own game because of greed. Sadly this is more common than not nowadays.
Got some lag when playing pvp with random player. Oponent hp didn't decreased, even if i hit 'em. And also... Too many IN GAME ADS. (sometimes it's very annoying).

I WANT to like this game. It's fun. The problem is the ads (I'm fine with ads. It's a free game) but mid game it randomly opens ads. I'm talking the kind that take you to a whole new window and tell you your phone is infected and won't let you go back without closing that tab. It screws up your shots and it's just NOT ok. Please fix this mess and I'll redownload and give the game a better review. Ads are one thing but when they make the game unplayable, I have to delete the game.

comments: Play this game if you have all kinds of money and just want to pay to win. There is little fun to be had outside of that.  Update: the developers listened to feedback and have been adding numerous ways to get advantages for free. Here is some respect for listening to your users. Rating increased!

Excellent game!!  Very addicting!  Can't put it down!!  :)  Only reason I am downgrading it to 3 stars is because of the horrible unfairness of what levels can attack other levels.  Like being a level 8 and being attacked by a level 28.  Needs to be fixed fast!!  One player will comme in and wipe out all of an Alliance that is much lower in power and defenseless.

One of the most unattractive games I've ever come across. Good idea to fill up the playing screen with so many icons, yeah that's not going to be a irritation for me when I'm trying to click on something. "Build an empire" they say. Well, with such bad graphics. I don't think I'll even bother building one. Horrible. That's the word for it.

The game has a lot of fun and addictive features. Its major drawback is that it's geared towards people who can spend $1000s  Don't get me wrong, it is still a great game, but if you don't plan to spend on a major scale, you will be disappointed

the customer support is the worst I've ever encountered. after a full month mailing back and forth I feel like I'm talking with idiot's. they don't care about there customers only taking your money. do not download, there are many different games out there who know how to look after there loyal players. don't waste your time or money. if your not Chinese they don't care

I enjoy the game a lot. It is pay to win in every sense of the word though. My problem is customer service is the worst. Takes 5 or 6 days to respond to help requests if they do at all. Good game, worst customer service possible.

description: Dancing Line 2018 combines fast-paced gameplay with a carefully selected soundtrack to create an experience like no other. Featuring different worlds of increasing difficulty, each one paints a unique picture and evokes different emotions. The key is to not only watch for obstacles and traps, but also play to the music. Listen to the beat and the melody, and after a short while you will find yourself doing better and better. Come on! Test your reflexes and rhythm skills! See the surprises and wonders every level holds for you.Game rules:Guide an ever-growing Line through a multiple of environments, listening carefully to the music. Tap the screen to make a sharp turn, avoiding obstacles and reacting to the World changing before your eyes.Game features:1. Original background music2. Multiple levels of increasing difficulty with their own stories3. Very simple practice mode with only one finger tap4. Music is the key to guide you5. Touch reaction, sound sense, and visual reaction is indispensable.6. 3D physical environment and moderate music.7. The line guide your tapping and dancing.Finally all i am going to say is use your Skillful eyes and Finger to guide and Tap the Snake Line through the colorful Maze and enjoy the journey into a Tunnel and Subway Rush full of surprises and remember not to Smash and Hit the walls and to Stack until you reach your temple.Enjoy Sonic Dancing Line 2018 and if there is anything feel free to contact me by e-mail.
descriptionHTML:
Dancing Line 2018 combines fast-paced gameplay with a carefully selected soundtrack to create an experience like no other. Featuring different worlds of increasing difficulty, each one paints a unique picture and evokes different emotions. The key is to not only watch for obstacles and traps, but also play to the music. Listen to the beat and the melody, and after a short while you will find yourself doing better and better.

Come on! Test your reflexes and rhythm skills! See the surprises and wonders every level holds for you.

Game rules:
Guide an ever-growing Line through a multiple of environments, listening carefully to the music. Tap the screen to make a sharp turn, avoiding obstacles and reacting to the World changing before your eyes.

Game features:
1. Original background music
2. Multiple levels of increasing difficulty with their own stories
3. Very simple practice mode with only one finger tap
4. Music is the key to guide you
5. Touch reaction, sound sense, and visual reaction is indispensable.
6. 3D physical environment and moderate music.
7. The line guide your tapping and dancing.

Finally all i am going to say is use your Skillful eyes and Finger to guide and Tap the Snake Line through the colorful Maze and enjoy the journey into a Tunnel and Subway Rush full of surprises and remember not to Smash and Hit the walls and to Stack until you reach your temple.

Enjoy Sonic Dancing Line 2018 and if there is anything feel free to contact me by e-mail.
summary: The New Game Of Dancing Line Finally On The store and Its Totally.
title: Dancing Line 2018

description: Tap to dig up zombies, collect brains and prepare for Armageddon in this addictive idle tycoon game! Upgrade your undead, summon werewolves, invest in research, release zombie giants and tap tap tap away to create the ultimate zombie army!Watch your graveyard grow from weak Zombabies to fully-grown Zombiggies. Activate an apocalypse to release your army and gain Infection Points enabling your zombies to collect even more brains!This is an idler, so your zombie army are always collecting brains, even if you're not in the game!FEATURES:• Introducing a new type of idle, clicker or tycoon game!• Start with a shovel and turn a decrepit graveyard into a monstrous undead army!• Unlock FIVE unique zombie classes!• Visit new worlds and discover their secrets!• Summon 10+ different zombies, each with their own personalities!• Hatch the mysterious Big Wiggly Egg and discover what's inside!• LIVE CHAT directly to the developers to make suggestions! • Constantly earn brains, even if you are offline!• Tap and upgrade your way to armageddon!• No Internet Connection required to play••• Will your Zombie Army take over the world? •••Got any problems or suggestions with our zombie game? Tap the Chat button in Settings to speak with us! Or, even better, join our Discord channel here: https://discord.gg/dyYXVt2
descriptionHTML:
Tap to dig up zombies, collect brains and prepare for Armageddon in this addictive idle tycoon game! Upgrade your undead, summon werewolves, invest in research, release zombie giants and tap tap tap away to create the ultimate zombie army!

Watch your graveyard grow from weak Zombabies to fully-grown Zombiggies. Activate an apocalypse to release your army and gain Infection Points enabling your zombies to collect even more brains!

This is an idler, so your zombie army are always collecting brains, even if you're not in the game!

FEATURES:
• Introducing a new type of idle, clicker or tycoon game!
• Start with a shovel and turn a decrepit graveyard into a monstrous undead army!
• Unlock FIVE unique zombie classes!
• Visit new worlds and discover their secrets!
• Summon 10+ different zombies, each with their own personalities!
• Hatch the mysterious Big Wiggly Egg and discover what's inside!
• LIVE CHAT directly to the developers to make suggestions!
• Constantly earn brains, even if you are offline!
• Tap and upgrade your way to armageddon!
• No Internet Connection required to play

••• Will your Zombie Army take over the world? •••

Got any problems or suggestions with our zombie game? Tap the Chat button in Settings to speak with us! Or, even better, join our Discord channel here: https://discord.gg/dyYXVt2
recentChanges: + You voted (in Discord) and here it is...SECRET FOREST!
+ Coffin faces now display your Zombie's rarity!
+ Losing brains on return to game!
+ Increased hit boxes on most buttons!
+ Duplicate Zombie Parts now reward you values based on all Stages!
Chat to us on Discord: https://discordapp.gg/zombielabs
summary: Summon, upgrade and unleash your own Zombies in this addictive idle tycoon game!

descriptionHTML:
Puppies need your child's help to save their friends!
This game is made especially for children who like to play in Paw Puppy Patrol. It will bring a lot of fun thanks to the familiar characters. Your baby will like running around with the puppies, and you will have free time.
The game is designed for children of any age, it is easy to manage and the kid can easily figure out how to manage the puppies.
Let the kid feel like a real rescuer along with a patrol from his beloved cartoon.
Levels in the game The names for patrol puppies are created specifically for children's games, the interface is intuitive, as in any game for kids.

Features:
• Simple and intuitive game interface The name, designed specifically for children's games
• Intuitively understood levels for comfortable patrol management of puppies
• Ability to feel like a rescuer of one of your favorite characters cartoon about the dog patrol puppies
• Beautiful colorful graphics will pleasantly surprise your baby
• Pleasant background music written for children's games

Your child will be able to:
• Running and jumping with puppies
• Collect bones for puppies

The name - will allow your kid to run the Chase and advance through the levels of the game, achieving the best result. This simple game will capture your child from the first minute of the game!

In the future, other characters of the puppy patrol will be added: Marshall, Skye, Rocky and many others.
summary: Help the puppies during their exciting adventures
title: Super Patrol Paw Puppy Kids

descriptionHTML:
Pu is a cute little panda bear who loves to eat, have fun and take selfies. He expects you to feed him, dress him, clean him and take care of him like an animal.
Dozens of activities and exciting mini-games are available to take care of your new baby pet.
Are you ready to take care of your new and adorable virtual pet ?

► ADOPT PU : Give him a special name and make it evolve to reach his adult size. He is so cute !
► DRESS PU : Make the baby Pu cute and adorable like you ! Dress it up in fashion where to disguise it, create your own look !
► FEED PU : Pu loves the tasty and delicious food, it will feast !
► GIVE A BATH : In order for Pu to be clean and pretty, wash it and dab it.
► PLAY WITH PU : Full of fun mini-games to win coins and make your animal Happy ! But also challenges every day to win diamonds !
► SLEEP TIME : After a happy day, Pu is sleepy, lining it up to make him sleep.
► DECORATE THE HOUSE : The walls, floors, carpet, bathtub and still other elements to make your home unique !

This game is a free virtual animal game created by a small independent developer, a game that caters girls and boys and that I hope you will enjoy.

WHO IS THE GIANT PANDA BEAR?
Pu is an adorable baby pet.
He does not know how to care and take care of himself so he expects you to teach him ! Here are a few tips to make him happy and cheerful: Check that he has always eaten enough and that he is clean !
Pu is very gambler, he does not ask much time, play games a few minutes with him and he will be very happy and affectionate but be careful, after playing well it must be given a bath and bed.
He will then be in good shape and will grow quietly.

If you dream of taking care an animal and looking after a cute virtual baby animal, to see it grow, this game is perfect for you !
Adopt Pu and do in the happiest pets, you have to play !

This game is free but some activities or items described in this game description can be purchased with real money without any obligations.
This game is not primarily directed to children under the age of 13.

52 route de laverune, villa les colibris
34070 Montpellier
France

descriptionHTML:
★★★ Jungle Monkey Run 2 is coming now ★★★
★★★ Many new featrues Added ★★★

Jungle Monkey Run 2 is a classic adventure game same with Jungle Monkey Run,but new world,new featrues,new monsters and so on.

The monkey Kong has come to this beautiful island this time, and what will be the new challenge waiting for it?
The ferocious sharks and crabs, the octopus lurking in the water, the sudden attack of the flying bird, felt that Kong was really in trouble this time.

If it weren't for Kong's new skills, I could not believe that he could escape the island.
Are you ready to meet the challenge with Kong?

Jungle Monkey Run 2 Features :
--Jumping, sprint, gliding, and raising a variety of manipulative fun
--Strained monsters, such as frogs, cannibals, octopus, birds, and more
--Unexpected elements can make you jump higher
--Explore every wooden case and find hidden props
--Use sprints to destroy all obstacles
--The use of rising allows you to avoid the danger that you can't avoid
--30 ordinary levels, 60 targets
--8 challenge cards, you can get more bananas
--4 abilities are promoted to help you accomplish more

How to play:
--Clicking on the screen to jump
--While in the air, holding the screen can glide
--After a certain period of gliding, the role will rise
--Run a long distance, slide the screen to the right to release the sprint
--Down jump can trigger jumping flowers

Download Play it Now!Enjoy this adventure game!

description: Our lovely girl is getting married! She has dreamed about her wedding day since she was a little girl and now the moment has finally come. Enter one of the most elegant wedding games and help the bride and bridesmaids prepare for this special event.Getting ready for a wedding is not easy, it requires some effort and fashion sense. Our wedding game for girls has 4 levels, discover all the things you can do! The bride is going to be the center of attention, you should start with her! Enter the makeup salon and try on lovely shades of lipstick, eyeshadow, eyeliner and mascara. Create a delicate makeup look for the bride to be! After that, visit the hair salon and make sure she gets the perfect hairstyle.The most important part of a bride look is the dress. Enter the wedding dress up level and choose carefully. The dressing room is filled with all types of amazing wedding gowns and you can try all of them before you decide which one looks best on the sweet girl. Whatever you like, you will find it at the wedding fashion salon. Don't forget to pick a nice flower bouquet and a bride veil.The bridesmaids will also need a fashion adviser, don't forget to play dress up with them too. descriptionHTML:
Our lovely girl is getting married! She has dreamed about her wedding day since she was a little girl and now the moment has finally come. Enter one of the most elegant wedding games and help the bride and bridesmaids prepare for this special event.

Getting ready for a wedding is not easy, it requires some effort and fashion sense. Our wedding game for girls has 4 levels, discover all the things you can do! The bride is going to be the center of attention, you should start with her! Enter the makeup salon and try on lovely shades of lipstick, eyeshadow, eyeliner and mascara. Create a delicate makeup look for the bride to be! After that, visit the hair salon and make sure she gets the perfect hairstyle.

The most important part of a bride look is the dress. Enter the wedding dress up level and choose carefully. The dressing room is filled with all types of amazing wedding gowns and you can try all of them before you decide which one looks best on the sweet girl. Whatever you like, you will find it at the wedding fashion salon. Don't forget to pick a nice flower bouquet and a bride veil.

The bridesmaids will also need a fashion adviser, don't forget to play dress up with them too. You can pick matching outfits or completely different clothes for each girl. Even though the bride is the most important person at the wedding, the bridesmaids will also need to shine. Do your best as a wedding stylist!

Classy Wedding Salon game features:
💐 a gorgeous bride and 3 bridesmaids
💐 makeup, hair and dress up game levels
💐 wedding themed makeup, hairstyles and clothing items (dresses, blouses, skirts and lots of accessories)
💐 girly graphics and intuitive gameplay
💐 free to play wedding game
💐 fun and safe for little girls
💐 no wifi game

The wedding will start soon and these lovely girls need you! Join them right away in one of the most amazing wedding games. Do the bride's makeup, style her hair and find the perfect wedding dress. Then, explore different fashion options with the 3 bridesmaids. You will never get bored of this game for girls, give it a chance and let the fun begin!
recentChanges: No more bugs and the game is faster than ever. Have fun playing and don't forget to send us your feedback!
summary: Make the bride and her bridesmaids look perfect on the special wedding day!
title: Classy Wedding Salon

comments: Love this game. But always watching videos is becoming a drag. Cant win gems very often. Freezing has been sorta fixed but now there is an issue of video (as much as i hats them) loading failure. Ive lost out on double coins or 2nd life and is annoying (but not as annoying as videos)

I was happy to see this game updating on my phone, but instead of working on optimizations, you went ahead and went even heavier on the microtransactions. Game still has an awful framerate on my phone which makes timing the jumps on the hardest levels impossible. My phone is last gen, so it can't be the problem.  It's a shame you guys are giving Simon's Cat such a bad reputation with this game. I'm uninstalling.

Amazing game. One suggestion though. After you in pause the game, there needs to be a short count down so you don't crash or anything.  UPDATE: to many microtransactions! Gems need to be somewhat easier to get, and for the love of our sanity PLEASE change the sound of collecting butterflies to somthing not as loud and annoying.

Gameplay is fun and kid-friendly. Rewards are well-paced. Randomly-generated levels keep it fresh. Had some issues with the "watch ad to double this reward" feature not working properly. If you enjoy the "Simon's Cat" animated shorts, or just love adorable animated kitty cats, you'll likely enjoy this game.

I enjoy it, hoping to see new bonus plays in the near future.  Update. New update does not run smoothly. Controls stick my cat gets stuck in slide, doesnt respond to dash at timed or will jump instead of slide.
Downloaded because I loved Crunch Time. However, couldn't get the app to open, at all. Kept crashing, so didn't even get to try it. Very disappointing, as I was looking forward to playing this.

descriptionHTML:
The most cute bear of the history is coming! This is an epic game, exciting levels continuously. What is more, this bubble shooting game for free!
How to Play:
- Aim and match bubbles where you want to shoot the bubble.
- To group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.
- Clear all the bubbles on the screen to get to a new level.
- More than seven kinds of cute bear is waiting for you to unlock,you can invite five friends to unlock the special role.
- Less moves you pass a level, higher score you'll get.
- At the end of game,you will be awarded coins according to the score. the higher score you got, the more coin will be awarded.
- At the end of game,you can click the falling bubbles to get higher score
Features:
+ easy operation but lots of fun.
+ Gorgeous special effects and beautiful images.
+ Different roles dress
+ Many interesting props to help you pass game quickly
+ A combination of multiple bubbles
+ No wifi can also play
if you like bubble shooting game,It is worth to try. Let's play it!

description: Barber Shop Simulator 3d lets players live out the fantasy life of a top-level barber!Work your way through twenty five tough levels that increase in difficulty with every new customer that walks through your doors! Think you can shave a man with a cut-throat razor? Can you shape his beard just the way he wants it? Can you turn the mess of facial hair he calls a beard into something truly unique and amazing? Barber Shop Pro 3D will push you to your limit!Your customers don't just want their beards shaved off, they'll want you to give them that perfect moustache - the one that makes them look and feel like a real man - and they'll want it done the only way a professional barber should, with a sharp blade and a steady hand!You'll be scored on your accuracy and your time - shave too much off and you'll lose points. Take too long and you'll lose points. And if your customer isn't completely happy with the job, he'll make sure you don't get paid the full price! The pressure is on!Get that blade under the nose and make sure you follow the contours of your customer's face, there's nothing worse than a nick of a razor on soft skin! You've got a guide image and you've got a selection of razors, and that's all you need save for your skill. How are you at Pencil moustaches? can you shape a Horse Shoe? How about the super tricky Handlebar? They're even trickier to resist pulling on! The Toothbrush, the Walrus, the Pyramid - there's so many moustache styles out there and you're going to have to master them all if you're going to make it to the top of your game!As you progress through the levels, the job gets harder, the time gets shorter and the beard styles get trickier! But to make it easier, you can spend your hard-earned dough on better razors that will do the job in half the time - in the right hands.So get ready to open your doors and welcome your customers in - right here at Barber Shop Simulator 3D where the razors are sharp and the styles are sharper!
descriptionHTML:
Barber Shop Simulator 3d lets players live out the fantasy life of a top-level barber!

Work your way through twenty five tough levels that increase in difficulty with every new customer that walks through your doors! Think you can shave a man with a cut-throat razor? Can you shape his beard just the way he wants it? Can you turn the mess of facial hair he calls a beard into something truly unique and amazing? Barber Shop Pro 3D will push you to your limit!

Your customers don't just want their beards shaved off, they'll want you to give them that perfect moustache - the one that makes them look and feel like a real man - and they'll want it done the only way a professional barber should, with a sharp blade and a steady hand!

You'll be scored on your accuracy and your time - shave too much off and you'll lose points. Take too long and you'll lose points. And if your customer isn't completely happy with the job, he'll make sure you don't get paid the full price! The pressure is on!

Get that blade under the nose and make sure you follow the contours of your customer's face, there's nothing worse than a nick of a razor on soft skin! You've got a guide image and you've got a selection of razors, and that's all you need save for your skill. How are you at Pencil moustaches? can you shape a Horse Shoe? How about the super tricky Handlebar? They're even trickier to resist pulling on! The Toothbrush, the Walrus, the Pyramid - there's so many moustache styles out there and you're going to have to master them all if you're going to make it to the top of your game!

As you progress through the levels, the job gets harder, the time gets shorter and the beard styles get trickier! But to make it easier, you can spend your hard-earned dough on better razors that will do the job in half the time - in the right hands.

So get ready to open your doors and welcome your customers in - right here at Barber Shop Simulator 3D where the razors are sharp and the styles are sharper!
recentChanges: -ATTENTION: If on your android phone the game is not working, please send to the email support the model, Thanks
summary: Shave 'em like a pro! live out the fantasy life of a top-level barber!
title: Barber Shop Simulator 3D

comments: The update has not gone out to everyone so there's still time to fix it. 2 units per level? No big items and outrageous bids? A big let down from previous levels.

SUPER  ADDICTIVE  Time killer for sure.... This game has awesome graphics as well as controls. I literally stopped playing others games for this one. The only dislikes about this game is the ADS. Other than that this game is awesome and requires patience once the energy level is down.

I finished Miami months ago waiting for a new update. Now that there was finally an update I can't open the new one which is Texas. I've unlocked everything in Miami and have more than enough money to unlock Texas. What's going on? Going to uninstall soon if it doesn't work.
Overall this game is fun. Only bad thing to say is there is way too many ads. I believe it discourages you from playing the game longer due yo an ad every like 30 seconds

Really liked this game to start off. Good fun to play but it starts to get near impossible to unlock the next areas without purchasing in-game money which really annoyed me. Have to keep repeating the same levels over and over hoping you eventually get enough money gathered up. It's more likely you will just purchase in-game money from them or in my case, get bored repeating levels and end up un-installing
Good game. No glitches. Easy to build up your shop. You can get caught out trying to bid-up the game players. If there becomes Multi-player mode & more updates I will rate 5*

Venture into the high-stakes world of storage auctions, run your own pawn shop and build your reputation as the smartest and quickest bidder on the scene! comments: Alright, so the game is pretty good. All I ask for is more tricks, and the ability to upgrade some bonuses (coin magnet, feather hover thing, and the third one that I haven't grabbed yet.) All in all, if you could do that, it'd make the game so much greater. Apart from skipping missions and revives there's no use for coins.

Good graphics, but can get boring after only like 3 minutes. Also the makers of the game should add a another different mode where your running away from a villager/camper and see how far you can get. You could improve or modify this mode that i have made if you want

The thing that makes this game great is the visuals and the audio. It is absulutley beautiful and the art style works so well with the type of game. Without this the game would not be nearly as good as the game play I'd very simple but it would still do ok. However these features are what makes the game. Also the fact that there's a night and day feature gives the game an even bigger opportunity to show the beauty of its art style

First off, I'd like to give a big thank you to the developers for this game. It's amazing.  However, I've been encountering quite a few bugs lately. One day, picking up a hover feather crashed the game. Today, I can't pick up llama horns, and the background blur that happens when you go into the workshop stayed into an actual run. I took this as a challenge and continued playing. I'm on a Samsung Galaxy Tab A 9.7 running Android Marshmallow.  This is just to tip you guys off on some bugs.

The game is addictive, but i cannot play it more than 10 minutes at a time, because it gets boring. The awful part is that since 1 week, i dunno why, it crashes while i'm playing.. Anyway, it's addictive because after you start playing, you start thinking about it while you're not playing

So idk what happened with a recent update, im a premium player so maybe it was in that update but my game will randomly force close now, thought it might have just been my phone but recently got a new phone and it is persistent. Can you guys please look into a fix, i love this game and the force crashing seems to be happening more frequently
description: Join Alto and his friends as they embark on an endless snowboarding odyssey. Journey across the beautiful alpine hills of their native wilderness, through neighbouring villages, ancient woodlands, and long-abandoned ruins.Along the way you'll rescue runaway llamas, grind rooftops, leap over terrifying chasms and outwit the mountain elders – all while braving the ever changing elements and passage of time upon the mountain.Features:• Fluid, graceful and exhilarating physics-based gameplay• Procedurally generated terrain based on real-world snowboarding• Fully dynamic lighting and weather effects, including thunderstorms, blizzards, fog, rainbows, shooting stars, and more• Easy to learn, difficult to master one button trick system• Chain together combos to maximize points and speed• Test your skills with 180 handcrafted goals• Discover six unique snowboarders, each with their own special attributes and abilities• Challenge your friends. Compete for best high score, best distance, and best trick combo!• Acquire the wingsuit from Izel’s workshop for an entirely new gameplay dynamic• Beautifully minimalist and evocative visual design• Original music and handcrafted audio for an ambient and immersive experience (headphones recommended!)Reviews:"A piece of interactive art"– WIRED"One of the best mobile games"– The Verge"Alto's Adventure demands your attention"– IGN"Best Looking Video Games of 2015"– TIME
descriptionHTML:
Join Alto and his friends as they embark on an endless snowboarding odyssey. Journey across the beautiful alpine hills of their native wilderness, through neighbouring villages, ancient woodlands, and long-abandoned ruins.

Along the way you'll rescue runaway llamas, grind rooftops, leap over terrifying chasms and outwit the mountain elders – all while braving the ever changing elements and passage of time upon the mountain.

Features:

• Fluid, graceful and exhilarating physics-based gameplay

• Procedurally generated terrain based on real-world snowboarding

• Fully dynamic lighting and weather effects, including thunderstorms, blizzards, fog, rainbows, shooting stars, and more

• Easy to learn, difficult to master one button trick system

• Chain together combos to maximize points and speed

• Test your skills with 180 handcrafted goals

• Discover six unique snowboarders, each with their own special attributes and abilities

• Challenge your friends. Compete for best high score, best distance, and best trick combo!

• Acquire the wingsuit from Izel’s workshop for an entirely new gameplay dynamic

• Beautifully minimalist and evocative visual design

• Original music and handcrafted audio for an ambient and immersive experience (headphones recommended!)

comments: The puzzles are fun, but... I like these puzzles very much, but I have one minor quibble and one major complaint preventing me from giving this app a five-star rating. The quibble - the  language used in "do you want to quit yes/no" splash is Danish. Surely if you can offer puzzles in two languages, you can make the language in the exit splash match the language selected in Settings. The complaint - the ads are very intrusive. Forcing me to close a full screen ad every time I complete a puzzle is very user-unfriendly. If you must force ads on us, at least display them only on the bottom of the screen. Even better, offer a premium version/in-app purchase to eliminate the ads.

description: This is crosswords the Scandinavian way: Clues in squares.Solve fun and challenging crosswords in this app, which will give you plenty of intelligent entertainment - every day.The app is 100% free: The crosswords are free, and they will continue to be so.Download the app now, and you'll be solving your first crossword within 1 minute. No registration or tedios steps to go through. Just choose which crossword you want to solve - then you're good to go!You will always have at least 30 free crosswords on the app. Every day a new crossword appears, and the oldest is discarded.If you enjoy solving crosswords, this is the app for you. Solve crosswords in the bus, in the line in the supermarket, or as a 10 minute break from work.If you experience problems, or have questions about any of the crosswords, we'd love to hear from you at digitalcrosswords@krydsord.dk.

comments: Graphics are crystal clear, game play is easy to understand, assists in majority of the steps needed to build and upgrade your city buildings and troops and a dragon. Play in tournaments, and get rewards to assist in your upgrading. What's not to love,  course I'd like to see this game run without an internet connection so I could play offline too...thanks.

The game is supposed to be for battling your enemy but you spend countless hours sorting through the packs which are random at best in content offering very little for the price paid. They encourage you to register the game with an email account but give you the run around should you seek to change it. The game is not worth the time nor money.

Was addictive so I spent 25 over 5 weeks. Not knowing there are no rules on who hits who. High level player just continue to beat down on low level player. Nothing to even it out except spend money. Shame on you game designers
